first_translate: I want  us to meet up together...
and go out just by ourselves.
going on an outing... all alone...
it sounds like we’re going on...
wait! how did you get here?!

hangle: 보통 황족들은 몰래 만들어 놓은 비밀통로로 빠져나오잖아?
first_translate: well, don’t members of royal families usually sneak around through secret passageways when they leave their homes?
that’s what happens in movies and novels at least.

hangle: 멀쩡한 입구를 두고 왜 그래야 하는데.
first_translate: but why would he need to use one if there are normal entrances available?

hangle: 혹시 비밀 호위 같은 것도 데리고 왔어?
first_translate: do you have any bodyguards following you?
let's stop talking about that now. shall we head off?

hangle: 저 녀석은 엉뚱한 생각만 하고 있군…
first_translate: all he can think about is weird stuff...
meanwhile, some people were so excited thinking this might be a date that they couldn’t even fall asleep last night.
this festival is bigger than I thought.
there are lots of people as well...
if we lose each other here, things could become complicated.

hangle: 데이트도 아닌데 손 정도는 잡아도 되겠지?
first_translate: can I hold your hand since this isn’t technically a date anyway?
why aren’t you holding my hand back?

hangle: 시그렌, 어릴 때나 했던 일이라 별로야?
너와 손을 잡는 건 문제가 아냐, 피오나.
first_translate: the problem doesn’t lie in me holding hands with you, fiona.

hangle: 시그렌이 이해가 안 가는 말을 하긴 해도
first_translate: even though siegren says strange things sometimes,
my goodness, look at her! she’s adorable!
siegren went to buy snacks real quick.
if you’re alone, then perhaps we could take a stroll around the market together--
oh no, I’m not alone. my companion is right behind me.

hangle: 의외로 난 수도에서 먹히는 얼굴인가 봐.
first_translate: apparently, I seem more attractive to men here in the capital city compared to hailon.

hangle: 인기 없게 만든 범인 중 하나
first_translate: too bad I'm partly responsible for making him unpopular.

hangle: 시그렌, 저기서 뭔가 하는 것 같아.
first_translate: siegren, it looks like they’re doing something interesting over there.
siegren’s mother used to be a songstress, didn’t she?

hangle: 시그렌도 축제를 즐기고 있는 것 같아.
first_translate: at least siegren also appears to be enjoying himself.
be careful getting down from there.
I feel uneasy watching you walk down those stairs.

hangle: 아까 말해 준다는 거, 아직 말 안 해줬어. 손잡는 거 말이야.
first_translate: earlier, you said you’d explain why you wouldn’t hold my hand properly. but you haven’t told me yet.
what did you mean when you said “the issue is me”?

hangle: 이제는 신분도 달라졌으니, 그 부분이 곤란한 걸까?
first_translate: now that our social status has changed, is that causing problems for you?

hangle: 지금 들으면 자고 일어나서 까먹을 것 같은데.
first_translate: I’m sleepy, so I might forget everything after waking up tomorrow morning.
unlike you, I end up wanting more.
